sys_atf_step.description: Validate that the form matches the following condition: Type = Normal and Conflict status = Not Run and State = New and Impact = 3 - Low and Priority = 4 - Low and Model = Normal and Requested by = Jay Simcox and Short description = Sales SharePoint permissions modification request and Define Proposed Change = We'd like the permissions level the Sales Members Group currently has (Contribute) changed to Read, Users are making changes that are causing issues with calculators and templates in the library.Additionally, there are multiple user accounts for employees no longer with the company we'd like removed. I've attached a spreadsheet that lists both the Sales Member and Sales Owner group memberships for reference.Currently, the only members of the Sales Members group that need the ability to make changes of any kind to that library are Patrick Abel, Kevin Boucher, Brad Shannon, John Crouch, Carson Plunkett, Vadim Sushchik, Josiah Spann, Patrick Peebles, Ken Snyder, and Jay Simcox and CAB required = false and Business Justification = document control need to prevent ongoing rework of templates that are changed causing formulas to break and templates to be recreated or re-located. and Approval = Not Yet Requested and On hold = false and Unauthorized = false and Risk = Moderate and Category = Other With a failure timeout of 30 Seconds

test.display_value: ATF Generated Test - change_request, Jay Simcox, User's default view (Default view)
